quantifiedTypesBasic2.ts(11,20): error TS2322: Type 'string | number' is not assignable to type 'string'.
  Type 'number' is not assignable to type 'string'.


==== quantifiedTypesBasic2.ts (1 errors) ====
    declare const f1: (t: <T> T) => void
    f1("hello")
    
    declare const f2: (t: <T> { values: T[], identifier: (value: T) => string }) => void
    f2({
      values: [{ key: "a" }, { key: "b" }, { key: "c" }],
      identifier: v => v.key
    })
    f2({
      values: [{ key: "a" }, { key: "b" }, { key: 0 }],
      identifier: v => v.key
                       ~~~~~
!!! error TS2322: Type 'string | number' is not assignable to type 'string'.
!!! error TS2322:   Type 'number' is not assignable to type 'string'.
!!! related TS6502 quantifiedTypesBasic2.ts:4:54: The expected type comes from the return type of this signature.
    })
